author.name: Bryan Berry - Nathen Harvey - Matt Ray

entry.title: Learning Reviews
entry.content:
Join us for a discussion of Learning Reviews. What and how can we learn from failure?

The episode will be broadcast live on Thursday, October 29, 2015 at 13:00:00 UTC. Want to join the panelists? Reach out on twitter (@foodfightshow) to let us know.

  • Panel
  • Outline
  • Picks
  • Download
    • Video - Coming soon! The episode will be broadcast live on Thursday, October 29, 2015 at 13:00:00 UTC.
    • Audio - Coming soon!

Panel

  • Dave Zwieback twitter, blog, github
  • Caitlin Milligan Sheaffer twitter
  • Lola Soto twitter
  • Christopher Webber github, twitter
  • Yulia Sheynkman about
  • Robb Kidd github, twitter
  • Mike Fiedler github, twitter, blog
  • Nathen Harvey github, twitter, irc: nathenharvey, blog

Outline

  • Post Mortem or Learning Review?
  • Root Cause Analysis (RCA)
  • If these are entirely blameless, where is personal responsibility? Accountability for your work? (https://twitter.com/hyc_symas/status/656599316589641729)
  • Components of a Learning Review

  • Who is invited to the learning review?

  • Submit a PR to add to our outline.

Picks

Coming soon
